food.name: Пищевые волокна, Nutriose® FB 06, растворимая пшеничная клетчатка, Roquette

serves.comment:
This is a raw ingredient that has been Monash University Low FODMAP Certified™ and is commercially available for food manufacturers only.

Samples of the raw ingredient were analysed and assessed to be low in FODMAP and is suitable to use to develop low FODMAP products. The serving size shown indicates the maximum amount to use per serve size of a product. Please contact the supplier to find out more information about this ingredient.

Note: Products made using this ingredient must be tested and be part of the Monash University Low FODMAP certification program to claim to be Monash low FODMAP certified.

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

This food has been tested for FODMAP content only and not assessed for its suitability as a therapeutic good or for any of its health claims. Only consume the recommended serve size. If symptoms are triggered, discontinue use and seek advice from a dietitian or healthcare professional.
